word:
"TRUST TO GOD'S GUARDIANSHIP. HIS CHURCH IS TO BE TAUGHT. ENFEEBLED AND DEFECTIVE THOUGH IT IS, IT IS THE OBJECT OF HIS SUPREME REGARD."--LETTER 279, 1904 (AUG. 1, 1904). PUBLISHED IN SELECTED MESSAGES, B. 2, P. 396. 
                                                                           524
